How the System works

The Revolutionizing Crops Company will sign a contract with Rwandan management to advance agriculture effectively as well as develop the country’s economy. The Revolutionizing Crops Company will be operating in the country and the farmers will benefit from our services. We believe that through our services, a lot of farmers will benefit around the addition of 50% for current benefits for their crops

A farmer

a farmer can register in the system to check up for the neccessary information which can benefit them

Customer

a customer can register in the system to check for the products available in different location.

Visiters

a Visters can register in the system to get access to the farmers' activities in the different location of the country.

About

Revolutionalizing Crops is aiming to provide good services to people so that they can maximize their production in growing crops. The mission and vision of this company are to help farmers across the country to maximize their production through our services.
